DOC.criteria: BMI 2535 kg/m2 Healthy adult Age 3565 Weight stable Nondiabetic Major organ disease heart , kidney , liver Malignancy Inflammatory condition ( eg . lupus , rheumatoid arthritis , Crohn 's disease ) Eating disorder h/o bariatric surgery liposuction use blood thinner Coumadin ( aspirin ok )
